formations.notes: If you attack the ones at the back, they will respawn. Fight is ended when the ones at the front are defeated.
The sinscales will constantly respawn. The tanker becomes a target on either Auron's second turn, or Tidus' fourth turn.
The battle ends after two are defeated.
The battle ends after three turns.
Rikku joins after Klikk has lost half of its HP.
The sinscales will respawn, if you defeat all three of them.
The sinscales will respawn after some time.
You can only escape after Kimahri used Lancet on his first turn.
